{%trans "Poll From"%}

{%trans "ID"%}
{%trans "Variable"%} {%trans "Description"%}
{%trans "Priority"%} {%trans "Example"%}
count
int {%trans "From how many person the poll should be asked."%}
{%trans "Optional"%} 3500
gender
array {%trans "Select the gender that can answer the poll. It can be:"%}
["male"] {%trans "Only ask from males."%}
["female"] {%trans "Only ask from females."%}
["male" | "female"] {%trans "Only ask from males and females."%}
[null] {%trans "Ask anyone."%}
{%trans "Optional"%} ["male"]
marrital
array {%trans "Set the marrital status of the people who can answer the poll. It cant be:"%}
["single"] {%trans "Only ask from single people."%}
["married"] {%trans "Only ask from married people."%}
["single", "married"] {%trans "Only ask from single and married people."%}
[null] {%trans "Ask anyone."%}
{%trans "Optional"%} ["single"]
graduation
array {%trans "Set the graduation status of the people who can answer the poll"%}
["illiterate"] {%trans "Ask from illiterate people."%}
["undergraduate"] {%trans "Ask from undergraduate people."%}
["graduate"] {%trans "Ask from graduate people."%}
["illiterate", "undergraduate"] {%trans "Ask from illiterate and undergraduate people."%}
["illiterate","graduate"] {%trans "Ask from illiterate and graduate people."%}
["undergraduate", "graduate"] {%trans "Ask from undergraduate and graduate people."%}
["illiterate", "undergraduate", "graduate"] {%trans "Ask from illiterate, undergraduate and graduate people."%}
[null] {%trans "Ask anyone."%}
{%trans "Optional"%} ["graduate"]
